plugin_desc: It is used to collect various monitoring index data of Tencent Cloud in real - time, covering dimensions such as computing resources, network performance, and storage usage, helping users gain in - depth insights into resource status, accurately locate anomalies, and efficiently complete operation and maintenance management and cost optimization.

metrics.name: CPUUsage_gauge
metrics.description: The real-time percentage of CPU occupied during machine operation.

metrics.name: MemUsed_gauge
metrics.description: The actual memory used by the user, excluding memory occupied by buffers and system cache. Calculated as Total Memory - Available Memory (including buffers and cached).

metrics.name: MemUsage_gauge
metrics.description: The actual memory utilization rate by the user, excluding memory occupied by buffers and system cache. It is the ratio of actual user memory usage to total memory.

metrics.name: CvmDiskUsage_gauge
metrics.description: The percentage of used disk capacity relative to total capacity (all disks).

metrics.name: LanOuttraffic_gauge
metrics.description: Average outbound traffic rate on the internal network interface card.

metrics.name: LanIntraffic_gauge
metrics.description: Average inbound traffic rate on the internal network interface card.

metrics.name: LanOutpkg_gauge
metrics.description: Average outbound packet rate on the internal network interface card.

metrics.name: LanInpkg_gauge
metrics.description: Average inbound packet rate on the internal network interface card.

metrics.name: WanOuttraffic_gauge
metrics.description: Average outbound traffic rate on the external network (sum of EIP, CLB, and CVM outbound bandwidth). The minimum granularity is a 10-second average.

metrics.name: WanIntraffic_gauge
metrics.description: Average inbound traffic rate on the external network (sum of EIP, CLB, and CVM inbound bandwidth). The minimum granularity is a 10-second average.

metrics.name: WanOutpkg_gauge
metrics.description: Average outbound packet rate on the external network interface card.

metrics.name: WanInpkg_gauge
metrics.description: Average inbound packet rate on the external network interface card.
